QuestData.Title: Your First Day as a Pirate
QuestData.Description: Ye may be a slayer of Fleet Masters, but rules is rules and orders is orders. And MY orders say that all new pirates start out as swabbies. It's the rule.$b$bYou're to be working for Captain Keelhaul, the commander of the Riptide. It's the westernmost ship in the fleet, which is parked south of the tip o' the cape.$b$bFind him in his captain's chambers, and bring yer papers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Yer Papers to Captain Keelhaul.
QuestData.CompletionText: I trust y'got yer papers, swabbie. I'd hate t'send ye all the way back to Yancey.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes... yes... I see... well, everything appears to be in order.$b$bSlayer of the great Seahorn, eh? That doesn't matter on MY ship. Only thing you're gonna be slaying is deck stains. Grab a mop.
